ygData.authorName: These are the Daves I Know
ygData.from: These are the Daves I Know <douglas@...
ygData.subject: RE: possible big cheat for EQ....
ygData.msgSnippet: ... First, I don t think it s too much to ask for you to *TRIM* the messages you reply to?  Leave enough for context, and then move on, maybe? Secondly, if you
ygData.messageBody:
On Mon, 23 Aug 1999, Trevalien Manix wrote:

> This is ticking me off!

First, I don't think it's too much to ask for you to *TRIM* the messages
you reply to? Leave enough for context, and then move on, maybe?

Secondly, if you ever changed your perspective from the default
perspective to the full-screen mode, you'd have seen white cons; they're
black cons, but since the background is generally darker when in
full-screen mode, black wouldn't show up.

--
We cross our bridges when we come to them and burn them behind us,
with nothing to show for our progress but the memory of the smell
of smoke and the presumption that once our eyes watered.
